front.title: GitHub Configuration for IETF Working Groups

abstract.t: The use of GitHub in IETF working group processes is increasing. This document describes possible uses and conventions for working groups which are considering starting to use GitHub. It does not mandate any processes, and does not require changes to the processes used by current and future working groups not using GitHub. Discussion of this document takes place on the ietf-and-github mailing list (ietf-and-github@ietf.org), which is archived at <https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/search?email_list=ietf-and- github>.
